item.name: Twitter Happiness
item.desc: Produced data visualisations showing mood in the UK from Twitter. It utilises the D3js library to create bubble-like animations that can be interacted with. Cities are depicted in the United Kingdom with their averaged mood for the Christmas period. The application's sentiment analysis process was taken the Twitter Mood Predicts the Stock Market paper from Bollen et al. (2011), which meant it was hand-written into PHP from the paper.
